answerText: Amazon River[10] This is one of the largest branches of the Amazon that rises about 100 km north of Lake Titicaca.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | University of North Carolina, Truman State A, and University of Toronto | 9 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: Identify these rivers in Latin America,  [10] This river flows through Peru, Colombia, Bolivia, and other nations, and starts in the Atlantic ocean in Brazil.
